itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss LSU's devastating loss to Miss. St. and why the SEC is brutal, why this year's NBA Finals will be the lowest ratings ever, Ross hitting another 6+ team parlay again, how the Tampa Bay Lightning MORE than earned their Stanley Cup victory last night, and we break down the spreads in this week's NFL and College Football games.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss LSU's devastating loss to Miss. St. and why the SEC is brutal, why this year's NBA Finals will be the lowest ratings ever, Ross hitting another 6+ team parlay again, how the Tampa Bay Lightning MORE than earned their Stanley Cup victory last night, and we break down the spreads in this week's NFL and College Football games.
